April 16, 2019  MEDIA RELEASE ***FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE*** CENTRAL PARK FOUNTAIN City of Decatur crews will be performing repairs on the decorative fountain in Central Park beginning by approximately Tuesday,… Read more about Central Park Fountain

April 15, 2019 MEDIA RELEASE ***FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE*** Ameren Illinois crews will be installing a natural gas main on Water Street beginning Monday, April 22, 2019, weather permitting.  This work… Read more about Street Closure/Water St
